body:
Hey guys,


I create this post to collect all the useful materials for English learners. Hope that these can help you guys sharpen your skills :)

Please comment if you have any good resources to share with the community; I will check and add them to the list :). Thanks!

---

Chào các bạn,


Post này mình sẽ liên tục cập nhật để tổng hợp những tại liệu học tiếng Anh hữu ích. Hãy comment để mình bổ sung thêm nếu bạn có nguồn tài liệu nào hay muốn chia sẻ nhé! Cảm ơn mọi người!

---------------------------------------------

Learning Resources

  • Tự học Ielts 8.0 https://www.facebook.com/tuhocIelts8.0/?fref=ts

For those who wish to self-study Ielts, a very good to understand different parts in Ielts test. You can also see this guy video tutorials here.

  • IELTS Simon http://ielts-simon.com/

Basic & clear guidelines for Ielts writing.

  • Ieltsliz https://www.youtube.com/user/ieltsliz

Simple Ielts skills explanation in videos (but her speaking speed is slow and I often speed it up haha).

  • BBC learning english https://www.youtube.com/user/bbclearningenglish

Learn to speak English in daily life situation.

  • VOA Learning English https://www.youtube.com/user/VOALearningEnglish

Improve listening skill by news compilations.

  • Duolingo https://www.duolingo.com/

Learning website for the very beginners.

  • Memrise https://www.memrise.com/

Another good website to learn vocabulary.

  • ESL Lab http://www.esl-lab.com/

A great place to improve listening skill.

  • Babadum https://babadum.com

Enrich vocabulary with cool graphics


Useful websites

  1. Fun & Inspiration http://brightside.me/
  2. Tech http://thenextweb.com/
  3. Multiple topics https://medium.com/
  4. TED Talk https://www.youtube.com/user/TEDtalksDirector
  5. Art, animal & Fun http://www.boredpanda.com/
  6. CNN student news http://edition.cnn.com/studentnews
title: [Useful Materials Sharing] Tổng hợp những nguồn tài liệu học Tiếng Anh
